summary: We also published an " Easy Read" version of this report. Easy Read is a way of making written information easier to understand. We published the Easy Read version to make our report more accessible to certain people with intellectual and developmental disabilities. Millions of U.S. families include a child or parent with a disability. Many families struggle to find quality care for their children...
title: Child Care Accessibility: Agencies Can Further Coordinate to Better Serve Families with Disabilities
